Posts.EditableText:
This might sound like an odd, somewhat random question, but can I just get confirmation that there are no problems with players seeing images when I've used the 'show image' script?

I ask because I've used a number of images which are absolutely vital to the game being playable, and would prefer to know of any possible issues so that I can start looking into alternatives before I go any further.

In truth, the alarm bells starting ringing when I noticed another thread titled 'Another Does Quest have an image problem?', but on reading it, it seems the author was referring to 'image' in the context of reputation.

Posts.EditableText: There's no problems other than copyright implications regarding using images in Quest afaik.
